titles.title: Eliminating Bias in Algorithmic Systems Act of 2026
Eliminating Bias in Algorithmic Systems Act of 2026
A bill to require agencies that use, fund, or oversee algorithms to have an office of civil rights focused on bias, discrimination, and other harms of algorithms, and for other purposes.

action.text: Read twice and referred to the Committee on Homeland Security and Governmental Affairs.
